attributes.action: HAVE SOME COMMON SENCE, BANNING THE RED ARROWS WILL CAUSE WIDE SPREAD ANGER AND RESENTMENT.THE RED ARROWS ALWAYS PUT ON A BREATH TAKING DISPLAY ,PURE ENTERTANMENT NOT A POLITICAL STATEMENT................REMEMBER THIS IS ENGLAND!!!
